title: Can Riot demote my rank?
body: or do i need to lose games?

replies.body: We can't manually demote your rank as that would disrupt the integrity of the ranking system. You can always start a new account if you're wanting a fresh start with ranked in the middle of a season, but I'd also like to open this up to see why exactly you'd want to be demoted!
Plat elo is starting to give me brain damage and Silver-Gold is just fun overall

Ahhhhhh yea I can see that being an issue sometimes. However, it wouldn't necessarily be fair to all the Silver/Gold players having to play with someone who has Plat skill if were we to drop your rank for you =\ .
You can do it through dodging. Riot will not assist.

Dodging does NOT reduce your MMR, only your LP, and you can NOT go down in Division, you go into negative LP instead.

If you're Silver3 at 0 LP and you dodge, you go to -3, you're not demoted to Silver4.
